name: 2024 6th International Applied Mathematics, Modelling and Simulation Conference
content: Paper Publication: 1, Publication in International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. 2, Publication in International Journal of Applied Physics and Mathematics (IJAPM) (ISSN: 2010-362X), which will be indexed by Index Copernicus, EI (INSPEC, IET), CAS, Google Scholar, EBSCO, etc. 3, For those who are not willing to publish their papers, it's acceptable to submit abstracts for Presentation Only.
